Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It's not just a product; it's an experience tailored to enhance your daily life. Considering its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than its face value. For this exceptional item, I'm offering it to you at a special introductory price of $100. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope you'll consider taking advantage of it. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. Looking forward to your response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $100. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $100
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
